comments.text:
+mutts2004 you do realize that when i said JYP, it's the entertainment I'm 
talking about and not J.Y. Park, right? well i agree with you that a story 
line is better than the artists standing and mouthing the lyrics. but at 
2am's prev videos bighit successfully fused those two with perfect balance 
and harmony. I was NOT saying that I want 2am to stand and sing for their 
MVs, what I was saying is that why not make 2am as the actors?
comments.author: Josephine K

comments.text:
You do realize JYP is not the music video director, right? And there are 
other ballad singers who choose not to appear in their music videos / very 
little so the emphasis and focus is more on the song itself, the musicality 
and bringing it to life with a story instead of the artists just standing 
their mouthing the lyrics.
comments.author: mutts2004

kinds of videos better. sorry but I find watching an actor run for 4 and a 
half minutes kinda boring.

comments.text:
+Francesca Adre 2AM was actually co-managed by JYPE and Big Hit from 2010 
until April this year when they decided to renew their contract and managed 
by JYPE solely. Big Hit is not a JYPE's sub-company and all JYPE's 
sub-company are actually liquidated last year. this is their first comeback 
and first time in 5 years that they are using JYP's song as one of their 
tracks. that's why you never see BTS in JYP Nation concert unlike 2AM who 
is still considered as a part of JYP Nation
comments.author: aya_chan

comments.text:
+Francesca Adre
From what i understand and remember 2am was produced by JYP but managed by 
bighit (did they debut like this? idk). Then they moved entirely to bighit 
so they were no longer under JYP. But recently three of them (all of them 
except changmin) signed back with JYP and if I'm not wrong this was their 
first comeback after the move back to JYP. I'm don't follow 2am very 
closely so I might have somethings wrong here. Anyone else here know the 
accurate stroy? Man 2AM have like a super complicated thing going on with 
companies here lol. Oh and on wiki it says bighit was a former sub company 
of JYP, don't know how true that it though.

captions.text: Just watching your hair blowing in the breeze
A perfect moment I wish I could freeze
You came like a dream then left without a trace
I’m just so grateful in my heart to meet you in my life
The time the time when I met you
Countless nights I missed you and longed for you
Come to me again over the destiny
Come back to this fool who couldn’t say I miss you
Come to me again over the destiny
So I can fill my heart with your image that is fading
Like the warm spring sun, just like the first time
You came like a dream then left without a trace
I’m just so grateful in my heart to meet you in my life
The time (the time) the time (the time) I let you go
Countless nights I spent in tears
Come to me again over the destiny
Come back to this fool who couldn’t say I miss you
Come to me again over the destiny
So I can fill my heart with your image that is fading
Like the warm spring sun, just like the first time

Please come back once more
Come to me again over the destiny
So I can fill my heart with your image that is fading
Like the warm spring sun, just like the first time
